name: Dim City
description:
Black cats are being banned from the streets due to their unlucky-ness & infection.
Will you be able to go around town as a gothic, loli girl helping the black cats before they're kicked out!?

This was a game for: Darktober 2018 GameJam

TEAM: Art: ShainaSenpaii / Coding: Toxic-Theory |T_T|  / Audio: Filipe Silva
